text:
Check Digit | Senior Software Engineer | NYC | Full-time | Onsite | $140-200k

Early stage, high-volume cloud-based transaction processing platform

Our tech stack includes: Fullstack Typescript, Angular, Node.js, Go, Serverless AWS

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to take product ownership and be comfortable making technical design decisions.

Fullstack capabilities and leading edge knowledge of infrastructure-as-code, serverless architectures and continuous delivery. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about the latest cloud technologies, open-source, and love working with and developing scalable and reliable technologies.

Email: cathy.scanlon@chkdgt.com
